title: Mandiant's X account hacked by crypto Drainer-as-a-Service gang
description: Cybersecurity firm and Google subsidiary Mandiant says its Twitter/X account was hijacked last week by a Drainer-as-a-Service (DaaS) gang in what it described as "likely a brute force password attack." [...]

title: Cisco says critical Unity Connection bug lets attackers get root
description: Cisco has patched a critical Unity Connection security flaw that can let unauthenticated attackers remotely gain root privileges on unpatched devices. [...]

title: Fidelity National Financial: Hackers stole data of 1.3 million people
description: Fidelity National Financial (FNF) has confirmed that a November cyberattack (claimed by the BlackCat ransomware gang) has exposed the data of 1.3 million customers. [...]

title: Pro-Ukraine hackers breach Russian ISP in revenge for KyivStar attack
description: A pro-Ukraine hacktivist group named 'Blackjack' has claimed a cyberattack against Russian provider of internet services M9com as a direct response to the attack against Kyivstar mobile operator. [...]

title: Ivanti warns of Connect Secure zero-days exploited in attacks
description: Ivanti has disclosed two Connect Secure (ICS) and Policy Secure zero-days exploited in the wild that can let remote attackers execute arbitrary commands on targeted gateways. [...]

title: Fake 401K year-end statements used to steal corporate credentials
description: Threat actors are using communication about personal pension accounts (the 401(k) plans in the U.S.), salary adjustments, and performance reports to steal company employees' credentials. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5034441 security update fails with 0x80070643 errors
description: Windows 10 users worldwide report problems installing Microsoft's January Patch Tuesday updates, getting 0x80070643 errors when attempting to install the KB5034441 security update for BitLocker. [...]

title: Microsoft Exchange 2019 has reached end of mainstream support
description: Microsoft announced the end of mainstream support for its Exchange Server 2019 on-premises mail server software on January 9, 2023. [...]

title: ShinyHunters member gets 3 years in prison for breaching 60 firms
description: The U.S. District Court in Seattle sentenced ShinyHunters member Sebastien Raoult to three years in prison and ordered a restitution of $5,000,000. [...]
